name: archappenv
description: Provides Application Environment Variables from *.appenv.js / .env and Utilities

scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run build-ts
scripts.build-es5: npm run cleanup && npm run build-ts-es5
scripts.build-es6: npm run cleanup && npm run build-ts-es6
scripts.test: npm run cleanup && npm run test-ts
scripts.test-cvr: npm run cleanup && npm run test-cvr-ts
scripts.test-ts: npm run build-ts && npm run test-all
scripts.test-cvr-ts: npm run build-ts && npm run test-all-cvr
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run aftertests
